website_summaries.verdict: Water-resistant football that uses battery technology to light up in the dark. Football’s batteries can last for 100 hours.
pros: Football ships with an air pump
Will work around the beach, as it’s water-resistant and floats, but you also can play in the backyard or at the park
Battery only runs when the ball is in motion
cons: It’s not a regulation size football, so it may not work for all people

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Nice, lightweight practice football. I like that it is full size and not a tiny, toy football. The football senses motion, which turns on the LED light. As long as you keep throwing, it continues to put off light. When you stop, it turns itself off after a few minutes. It came with everything you need to inflate and a tool to swap out batteries if you need to. When I unpackaged mine, I initially thought that they forgot to include the needle tool for inflating it. It was stored inside the plunger of the pump. My son loves practicing with this football. It is a neat little novelty.
customer_reviews.author: Eagle

customer_reviews.title: Bright but finicky ball
customer_reviews.text: The first ball I received would not stay on so they sent me another one. The new ball works about 75% of the time - it routinely turns off mid flight or while we are tossing it around. The size, brightness and material of the ball is great but overall, the design is poor. Instead of a manual switch to turn the ball on or off, it relies on a sensor hot glued to a circuit board that is wedged inside the ball.
customer_reviews.author: mach1ne

customer_reviews.title: This football is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my son. He and his dad like to throw the ball before the school bus comes, and this time of year it’s still dark at 6:30. The “glow” is bright and even, and I love that it turns itself off when not in use. The ball itself is rubbery and easy to throw and catch. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: habow

customer_reviews.title: We love winter again!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. When it’s dark at 5pm (November in the midwest), my 10 year old HATED homework in the afternoon more than the usual VERY BRIEF bit of time we zip through a math worksheet. THIS let’s him play catch with dad after 5, and not stress out about the darkness! Love it. Pricey for us, but has been worth it for dark winter play.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS THING ROCKS...BETTER THAN I EXPECTED AND WORKS PERFECTLY. NOT ONOY DOES IT OPERATE EXACTLY AS ITS SUPPOSED TO (LIGHT WHEN MOVED AND OFF IN SECONDS WHEN STILL) BUT YOU REALLY CAN SEE IT IN THE DARK...LOTS OF FUN!!!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Riley

customer_reviews.title: Fun & great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Great gift idea for my 13 year old. Enables some fun games of catch in the dark or low light. Good quality football and light. Comes deflated so you pump it up yourself, easy. Has auto off and on with movement. Has been lots of fun and we’ve gotten compliments on it out at the park!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect football for nighttime play!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely LOVE this football. We purchased it for our son for Christmas. We walk every night and like to throw the football on our walks. Kind of difficult to do with a regular football when the times changes and it gets dark earlier. This football glows very bright but isn’t blinding. We haven’t had any problems with it staying lit when throwing. I would certainly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Briane Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a boy who loves football.
customer_reviews.text: Nice bright durable football. Good size too. All my boys had a good time playing with this. Stays lit while throwing but also automatically turns off when left idle for about half a minute. Love that it comes with a pump. So glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle F.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't light up
customer_reviews.text: The football I received doesn't light up (yes, I pulled the battery tab out correctly). Buy with caution.
customer_reviews.author: TNReb

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Birthday Gift for 10 year old
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my sons 10th birthday. He was having a sleepover with a bunch of his buddies & I knew they would want to be out playing football well after the sun had set. I was right & this was an absolute hit!! They loved it. I'm super pleased that I got this one that lights up & not one that 'glows in the dark'. Well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: It’s not as bright as advertised in the picture and it sometimes turns off mid throw, which makes it difficult for someone to catch in the dark. Other than that, my son loves it and enjoys the fact that the fun can continue even when it gets dark. Seems pretty durable. Would make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Such a cool ball
customer_reviews.text: I bought this football for my son and he absolutely loves it. He was so excited to see it glow at night. It's great for family outings that run till late at night.
customer_reviews.author: karina

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: It's an adult sized ball not suitable for little hands. But pretty cool nonetheless
customer_reviews.author: James G.

customer_reviews.title: Well made product.
customer_reviews.text: Well made football that seems like it will last a long time. Lights up when it is moved, then stays on for 15 to 30 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ortloff

customer_reviews.title: Bright & colorful
customer_reviews.text: Grandsons love it! Was in use as soon as the sun went down.
customer_reviews.author: B J HALL

customer_reviews.title: Great for night football
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Grandson's camping trip, he loved it and said his 4 year old cousin who caught it with her face sometimes :} didn't get hurt because it is soft.
customer_reviews.author: Liza

customer_reviews.title: Was great, for a couple weeks
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for a couple weeks, now won’t hold air.
customer_reviews.author: Adam L

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Ball is a little big for a kids hand but still allowed us to play ball at night
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Good glow, hard to throw.
customer_reviews.text: Our boys love how the ball lights up. And we can play at night. The ball is large, so it’s harder for kids to throw. It has grip, but again, not easily thrown by kids.
customer_reviews.author: Lara N. Charles

customer_reviews.title: Best football for playing after dark
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift for our son. It's easy to see in the dark, throws well with no wobbliness & turns itself off when you're done!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A+ football!
customer_reviews.text: This football is awesome! My 11 year old twin boys absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie Ryan Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Accurate description
customer_reviews.text: Lit up as I hoped for. Not a flare, but easily seen after the sun goes down.
customer_reviews.author: pminmn

customer_reviews.title: 12 yo son uses daily
customer_reviews.text: My son received this as a birthday gift. It feels like a regular football when held in hand. Only differ is this one lights up. The light up feature comes in handy when he plays catch in the evening.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Very bright glow
customer_reviews.text: Not sure yet how long this football will last but it sure glows like a champ!!
customer_reviews.author: Christian lee Collins

product_meta.title: MCNICK & COMPANY LED Glow in The Dark Youth Football - 100 Hour Battery Life - Light Up Football
product_meta.description:
WAIT TILL NIGHT FALLS! 

❓ Want to keep your game going for hours, even the sun goes down? 

Look no further! Light up your night match with our 🏀GLOW-IN-THE-DARK LED FOOTBALL🏀 

It measures 11 inches (Standard Youth Football) and in daytime, it looks just like a regular Football - but everyone will be surprised about its bright shine in the dark! 

Our LED Football is perfect for indoor or outdoor games and will illuminate in a bright red-orange glow upon impact. Unlike traditional glow-in-the-dark Footballs which start glowing after exposing to the light, ours uses high bright, impact activated LEDs to illuminate the entire Football with a magnificent glow! 

NEED MORE REASONS TO CHOOSE OUR LED FOOTBALL? 

✅ Illuminates automatically when the ball is moved, kicked or hits the ground. Lights will automatically shut off when not in use for 20 seconds! 

✅ 100 hours of battery life. Simply pull the tab to activate the batteries! 

✅ Tough and rugged construction. Absolutely no wobble whether bouncing or spinning in the air! 

✅ Perfect for practices, organized or friendly play, halftime shows, talent shows and trick shots! 

✅ Perfect way to motivate your kids to be active and start playing Football! 

✅ An excellent gift choice for all the ages in their birthdays, Christmas, Holidays and other special occasions! 

✅ Bundled with an air pump. Unpack, fill the ball with air and you are ready to go! 

✅ 30 day hassle free money back guarantee! No gimmicks! 

SO, WHY WAIT! GET YOURS TODAY AND BE THE FIRST ONE TO HAVE A GLOW IN THE DARK LED FOOTBALL! 

Note: The ball is not waterproof, so do not leave it in the rain!
feature_bullets: LED Glow in the Dark FOOTBALL (FOOTBALL PUMP INCLUDED) Enjoy more exciting gaming experience with MCNICK & COMPANY LED GLOW IN THE DARK LED FOOTBALL. It lights up outside with every shake, bounce, pass and catch and will stay lit for 30 seconds perfect for football enthusiasts who love to play outdoors, in the dark or past sunset!

PLUG AND PLAY TECHNOLOGY. Our Light up Football features battery powered (Included), impact activated LEDs with 100 hours of battery life! To activate the batteries, simply pull the tab, and upon impact, sensor kicks on and will instantly light up the ball! The LED lights will automatically turn off when the ball is motionless for 30 seconds!

******** 100 HOUR LED BATTERIES INCLUDED ****** Our Nighttime Football is made from high-quality construction, sturdy and durable materials for even the toughest of all players. An air pump is included in the package, so simply inflate the Football and you’re ready to play! INSIDE THE BOX IS A FOOTBALL, AIR PUMP, AND BATTERIES ALREADY INSTALLED (Important: The ball is not waterproof, so do not leave it in the rain)

***** PLEASE WATCH THE DEMO VIDEO IN THE PICTURE SECTION ***** Outdoor LED Glow in the Dark Football is sold In Retail Packaging - HONOR TO GIVE – PLEASURE TO RECEIVE. Everything is packed in a stylish gift packaging, ready for gifting! It makes an excellent birthday, Christmas or holiday gift for your son, husband, nephews, friends as well as Football lovers, fitness enthusiasts or people who want to start getting into shape!

GUARANTEED SATISFACTION OR YOUR MONEY BACK. We have made a complete commitment in making you happy with your purchase. But, in a rare case if you aren’t completely satisfied, simply let us know within 30 days of the purchase and enjoy 100% cash back. No questions! No small letters! SO WHY WAIT TILL THE LAST MINUTE? ORDER YOURS TODAY!
